dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools
dependencies.name: autoconf

dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools
dependencies.name: automake

dependencies.description: The GNU Project's Bourne Again SHell.
dependencies.name: bash

dependencies.description: GNU binutils, which contain the linker, assembler, objdump and others
dependencies.name: binutils

dependencies.description:
Bison is a general-purpose parser generator that converts an annotated
context-free grammar into a deterministic LR or generalized LR (GLR)
parser employing LALR(1) parser tables.
dependencies.name: bison

dependencies.description:
The NVIDIA HPC SDK is a comprehensive suite of compilers, libraries and
tools essential to maximizing developer productivity and the performance
and portability of HPC applications. The NVIDIA HPC SDK C, C++, and
Fortran compilers support GPU acceleration of HPC modeling and
simulation applications with standard C++ and Fortran, OpenACC
directives, and CUDA. GPU-accelerated math libraries maximize
performance on common HPC algorithms, and optimized communications
libraries enable standards-based multi-GPU and scalable systems
programming. Performance profiling and debugging tools simplify porting
and optimization of HPC applications.
dependencies.name: c

dependencies.description:
The GNU Core Utilities are the basic file, shell and text manipulation
utilities of the GNU operating system. These are the core utilities
which are expected to exist on every operating system.
dependencies.name: coreutils

dependencies.description:
cURL is an open source command line tool and library for transferring
data with URL syntax
dependencies.name: curl

dependencies.description:
elfutils is a collection of various binary tools such as eu-objdump, eu-
readelf, and other utilities that allow you to inspect and manipulate
ELF files. Refer to Table 5.Tools Included in elfutils for Red Hat
Developer for a complete list of binary tools that are distributed with
the Red Hat Developer Toolset version of elfutils.
dependencies.name: elfutils

dependencies.description: Flex is a tool for generating scanners.
dependencies.name: flex

dependencies.description:
If you are like many computer users, you would frequently like to make
changes in various text files wherever certain patterns appear, or
extract data from parts of certain lines while discarding the rest. To
write a program to do this in a language such as C or Pascal is a time-
consuming inconvenience that may take many lines of code. The job is
easy with awk, especially the GNU implementation: gawk. The awk utility
interprets a special-purpose programming language that makes it possible
to handle simple data-reformatting jobs with just a few lines of code.
dependencies.name: gawk

dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.
dependencies.name: gnuconfig

dependencies.description:
Grep searches one or more input files for lines containing a match to a
specified pattern
dependencies.name: grep

dependencies.description:
help2man produces simple manual pages from the '--help' and '--version'
output of other commands.
dependencies.name: help2man

dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.
dependencies.name: libtool

dependencies.description:
The ncurses (new curses) library is a free software emulation of curses
in System V Release 4.0, and more. It uses terminfo format, supports
pads and color and multiple highlights and forms characters and
function-key mapping, and has all the other SYSV-curses enhancements
over BSD curses.
dependencies.name: ncurses

dependencies.description:
Patch takes a patch file containing a difference listing produced by the
diff program and applies those differences to one or more original
files, producing patched versions.
dependencies.name: patch

dependencies.description:
pkgconf is a program which helps to configure compiler and linker flags
for development frameworks. It is similar to pkg-config from
freedesktop.org, providing additional functionality while also
maintaining compatibility.
dependencies.name: pkgconfig

dependencies.description: The Python programming language.
dependencies.name: python

dependencies.description: GNU implementation of the famous stream editor.
dependencies.name: sed

dependencies.description:
GNU Wget is a free software package for retrieving files using HTTP,
HTTPS and FTP, the most widely-used Internet protocols. It is a non-
interactive commandline tool, so it may easily be called from scripts,
cron jobs, terminals without X-Windows support, etc.
dependencies.name: wget

description:
Crosstool-NG is a versatile (cross) toolchain generator. It supports
many architectures and components and has a simple yet powerful
menuconfig-style interface.
name: crosstool-ng

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
